This folder contains everything related to 3rdparty code or tools.

dbghelp_x64 - Microsoft Debug Library (https://msdn.microsoft.com/de-de/library/windows/desktop/ms679294(v=vs.85).aspx)
libconfig - library for processing structured configuration files (http://www.hyperrealm.com/libconfig/)
luajit - Luajit as Submodule - using a Fork with modifications (www.luajit.org)
msinttypes - standard headers missing from Microsoft Visual Studio (http://code.google.com/p/msinttypes)
mysql - library for MySQL Community Server (http://www.mysql.com)
pcre - library for Perl Compatible Regular Expressions (http://www.pcre.org)
sfmt - SIMD-oriented Fast Mersenne Twister (http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/SFMT/)
tbb - Intel Threading Building Blocks, using a fork with modifications (Build form Source at: https://github.com/wilkemeyer/intel-tbb see fature branch win-hugepages) - (https://www.threadingbuildingblocks.org/)
zlib - library for DEFLATE lossless compression algorithm (http://www.zlib.net)
